post-2ace82: Bermuda confirmed 109 COVID-19 cases and 5 deaths, leading to necessary, strict lockdown measures to contain the outbreak.
post-a3be16: The island's Ministry of Health reported positive cases in a vulnerable setting, like a residential and nursing home.

post-7ed08f: Eight nurses at Kalawati Saran Hospital in Delhi tested positive for COVID-19, highlighting the high risk to frontline health workers.
post-b9ce1c: The infection of healthcare workers occurred despite protective measures, emphasizing the virus's highly infectious nature.
